posts.prompt: Generate a comprehensive blog post introducing SheetSpread as a Google Sheets add-on that transforms sheets into a powerful data integration platform
posts.title: Transform Google Sheets into a Data Powerhouse with SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread: Google Sheets Automation and Data Integration
posts.metaDescription: Discover how SheetSpread transforms Google Sheets into a powerful data integration and reporting platform with Salesforce sync, AI insights, and automated reporting.
posts.summary: An introduction to SheetSpread's core capabilities, explaining how it evolved from simple email snapshots to a comprehensive data integration platform. Covers the main features including Salesforce integration, AI-powered insights, automated reporting, and the Command Center dashboard. Includes use cases and getting started guide.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about connecting Salesforce to Google Sheets using SheetSpread's OAuth2 integration
posts.title: How to Connect Salesforce to Google Sheets (No Coding Required)
posts.metaTitle: Connect Salesforce to Google Sheets - SheetSpread Guide
posts.metaDescription: Step-by-step guide to connecting Salesforce to Google Sheets using SheetSpread's secure OAuth2 integration. Pull Salesforce data without writing code.
posts.summary: Complete walkthrough of setting up Salesforce integration with SheetSpread. Covers OAuth2 authentication, security best practices, sandbox vs production environments, and troubleshooting common connection issues. Includes screenshots and step-by-step instructions for non-technical users.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about SOQL queries for beginners using SheetSpread
posts.title: SOQL Queries for Non-Developers: Your Complete Guide
posts.metaTitle: SOQL Queries Guide for Non-Developers - SheetSpread
posts.metaDescription: Learn SOQL queries without coding experience. Complete guide to querying Salesforce data using SheetSpread with templates and examples.
posts.summary: Beginner-friendly introduction to SOQL (Salesforce Object Query Language). Covers basic query structure, common patterns, field selection, filtering, and best practices. Includes 10+ ready-to-use query templates for common use cases like opportunities, contacts, and accounts. Shows how to use SheetSpread's query builder and saved queries feature.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about automated email reporting with SheetSpread
posts.title: Stop Manual Reporting: Automate Your Data Reports with SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: Automated Email Reporting with Google Sheets - SheetSpread
posts.metaDescription: Set up automated email reports from Google Sheets with flexible scheduling. Daily, weekly, or monthly reports delivered automatically.
posts.summary: Comprehensive guide to SheetSpread's automated email reporting feature. Covers scheduling options (hourly, daily, weekly, monthly), email templates, recipient management, and report customization. Includes use cases like daily sales reports, weekly KPI updates, and monthly executive summaries. Shows how to preview emails before scheduling.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about AI-powered insights using Google Gemini in SheetSpread
posts.title: How AI Transforms Your Spreadsheet Data into Actionable Insights
posts.metaTitle: AI-Powered Data Insights with Google Gemini - SheetSpread
posts.metaDescription: Discover how SheetSpread uses Google Gemini AI to automatically generate executive summaries, trend analysis, and key insights from your data.
posts.summary: Deep dive into SheetSpread's AI-powered insights feature using Google Gemini 1.5 Flash. Explains how AI analyzes data to generate executive summaries, identify trends, detect anomalies, and create narrative reports. Includes examples of AI-generated insights from sales data, marketing metrics, and operational reports. Covers when to use AI vs manual analysis.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about the SheetSpread Command Center dashboard
posts.title: Meet Command Center: Your Centralized Data Operations Hub
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Command Center - Data Operations Dashboard
posts.metaDescription: Track all your data operations in one place with SheetSpread Command Center. Monitor queries, reports, and data syncs across your organization.
posts.summary: Introduction to the Command Center dashboard - SheetSpread's web-based control panel for monitoring all data operations. Covers query history tracking, analytics cards, recent activity timeline, re-run functionality, and performance metrics. Explains how teams use Command Center for operational visibility and data governance.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about Salesforce Reports integration with SheetSpread
posts.title: Sync Salesforce Reports to Google Sheets Automatically
posts.metaTitle: Salesforce Reports to Google Sheets - Automated Sync
posts.metaDescription: Automatically sync Salesforce Analytics API reports to Google Sheets with SheetSpread. Schedule updates and keep your data current.
posts.summary: Guide to using SheetSpread's Salesforce Reports sync feature. Explains how to connect to Salesforce Analytics API, select reports, schedule automatic syncs, and handle large datasets. Covers differences between SOQL queries and report syncs, when to use each approach, and best practices for report organization.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about data security and OAuth in SheetSpread
posts.title: How SheetSpread Keeps Your Salesforce Data Secure
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Security: OAuth2, Data Protection, and Compliance
posts.metaDescription: Learn about SheetSpread's security features including OAuth2 authentication, token management, and data isolation for enterprise-grade protection.
posts.summary: Comprehensive overview of SheetSpread's security architecture. Covers OAuth2 authentication flow, token storage and refresh, per-user data isolation, credential management, and compliance considerations. Addresses common security questions and explains how SheetSpread protects sensitive Salesforce data.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about real-world use cases for SheetSpread in sales teams
posts.title: 5 Ways Sales Teams Use SheetSpread to Close More Deals
posts.metaTitle: Sales Team Use Cases for SheetSpread - Real Examples
posts.metaDescription: Discover how sales teams use SheetSpread for pipeline reporting, forecast accuracy, opportunity tracking, and automated sales reports.
posts.summary: Collection of real-world use cases showing how sales teams leverage SheetSpread. Includes pipeline visibility dashboards, automated forecast reports, opportunity aging analysis, territory performance tracking, and sales rep scorecards. Each use case includes sample queries, sheet templates, and implementation tips.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about marketing analytics with SheetSpread
posts.title: Marketing Analytics Made Simple with SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: Marketing Analytics with SheetSpread - Salesforce Integration
posts.metaDescription: Track marketing performance with SheetSpread. Campaign ROI, lead generation, conversion rates, and attribution reporting made easy.
posts.summary: Guide to using SheetSpread for marketing analytics. Covers campaign performance tracking, lead source analysis, conversion funnel reporting, attribution modeling, and ROI calculations. Includes pre-built queries for common marketing metrics and tips for creating executive-ready marketing dashboards.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about handling large datasets in SheetSpread
posts.title: Working with Large Datasets: SheetSpread's Pagination Guide
posts.metaTitle: Handle Large Salesforce Datasets in Google Sheets - SheetSpread
posts.metaDescription: Learn how SheetSpread handles large datasets with automatic pagination, batch processing, and performance optimization.
posts.summary: Technical guide to SheetSpread's approach to large datasets. Explains automatic pagination for queries returning >2000 records, batch write operations, performance optimization strategies, and Google Sheets limits. Includes best practices for structuring queries to minimize data volume while maximizing insights.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post comparing SheetSpread to manual data exports from Salesforce
posts.title: Why Teams Are Replacing Manual Salesforce Exports with SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread vs Manual Salesforce Exports - Comparison
posts.metaDescription: Compare manual Salesforce data exports to SheetSpread automation. Save time, reduce errors, and keep data current automatically.
posts.summary: Side-by-side comparison of manual Salesforce exports vs SheetSpread automation. Quantifies time savings, error reduction, data freshness benefits, and collaboration improvements. Includes ROI calculator and migration guide for teams currently using manual export processes.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about saved queries feature in SheetSpread
posts.title: Speed Up Your Workflow with Saved Queries in SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Saved Queries - Reusable SOQL Templates
posts.metaDescription: Create and manage reusable SOQL queries in SheetSpread. Build a library of frequently-used queries for instant data access.
posts.summary: Guide to using SheetSpread's saved queries feature. Explains how to save frequently-used SOQL queries, organize query libraries, share queries with team members, and use query templates. Includes 15+ example saved queries for common business needs.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about SheetSpread for operations teams
posts.title: Operations Teams: Track Your Metrics in Real-Time with SheetSpread
posts.metaTitle: Operations Analytics with SheetSpread - Real-Time Metrics
posts.metaDescription: Monitor operational metrics in real-time using SheetSpread. Track SLAs, case volumes, response times, and team performance.
posts.summary: Use cases and tutorials for operations teams using SheetSpread. Covers SLA monitoring, case volume tracking, response time analysis, team productivity metrics, and escalation reporting. Includes automated alert setups and operational dashboard templates.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about the future of SheetSpread with upcoming features
posts.title: What's Next for SheetSpread: Upcoming Features Preview
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Roadmap - Upcoming Features and Updates
posts.metaDescription: Sneak peek at upcoming SheetSpread features including reverse sync, data merging, duplicate detection, and Google Slides generation.
posts.summary: Preview of SheetSpread's roadmap including bidirectional sync (pushing data back to Salesforce), daisy-chained uploads with ID mapping, org-wide dashboards, approval workflows, Google Forms triggers, Slides generation, and data merging capabilities. Invites user feedback on priorities.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about common SheetSpread mistakes and how to avoid them
posts.title: 7 Common SheetSpread Mistakes (And How to Avoid Them)
posts.metaTitle: Common SheetSpread Mistakes to Avoid - Best Practices
posts.metaDescription: Avoid these common SheetSpread mistakes. Learn best practices for queries, scheduling, data management, and performance optimization.
posts.summary: Collection of common mistakes users make with SheetSpread and how to avoid them. Covers query optimization, over-scheduling syncs, improper data scoping, security misconfigurations, sheet organization issues, and email report formatting problems. Each mistake includes explanation, impact, and solution.

posts.prompt: Generate a blog post about SheetSpread pricing and ROI
posts.title: SheetSpread Pricing: Calculate Your ROI in 5 Minutes
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Pricing and ROI Calculator
posts.metaDescription: Understand SheetSpread pricing and calculate your ROI. See how much time and money SheetSpread saves your team.
posts.summary: Breakdown of SheetSpread pricing with ROI calculator. Helps prospects calculate time savings from automation, reduced manual errors, faster decision-making, and improved data accessibility. Includes comparison to alternatives like hiring analysts or building custom integrations.

posts.title: Migrating to SheetSpread: A Smooth Transition Guide
posts.metaTitle: Migrate to SheetSpread from Other Salesforce Integrations

posts.metaTitle: Finance Reporting with SheetSpread - Revenue Analytics

posts.summary: Finance-focused use cases for SheetSpread including revenue reporting, bookings analysis, forecast accuracy tracking, renewal management, and financial close processes. Covers compliance considerations, audit trails, and integration with financial systems.

posts.title: SheetSpread Troubleshooting Guide: Fix Common Issues Fast
posts.metaTitle: SheetSpread Troubleshooting - Common Issues and Solutions
posts.metaDescription: Troubleshoot SheetSpread issues quickly. Solutions for connection problems, query errors, sync failures, and performance issues.
posts.summary: Comprehensive troubleshooting guide for SheetSpread users. Covers authentication issues, query errors, sync failures, performance problems, email delivery issues, and permission errors. Each issue includes symptoms, root causes, and step-by-step solutions.
